In Flutter normally we run backend on localhost , but in mobile app emulator works as a different network and pc is in a another network, so localhost mode is not working for both web and mobile. As a Solution I found out Cross Platform connectivity for my app. First you need to disable web security because it wont allow to connect backend server.
 1.Go to flutter\bin\cache and remove a file named:flutter_tools.stamp
2.Go to flutter\packages\flutter_tools\lib\src\web and open the file chrome.dart
3.Find ‘- -disable-extensions’
4.Add ‘- -disable-web-security’
